title: Kirchhoff loop - circuit part with R1 R2 emf1 emf2

content.question: The figure shows a portion of a circuit that includes two batteries and two resistors, as indicated. Which of the following equations expresses Kirchhoff’s loop rule for the portion of the circuit shown?

choices.label: <math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, plus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I sub 1, end sub, times R sub 1, end sub, minus I sub 2, end sub, times R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, plus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I sub 1, end sub, times R sub 1, end sub, plus I sub 2, end sub, times R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, minus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I sub 1, end sub, times R sub 1, end sub, minus I sub 2, end sub, times R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

<math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, minus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I sub 1, end sub, times R sub 1, end sub, plus I sub 2, end sub, times R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="script uppercase E sub 1, end sub, minus script uppercase E sub 2, end sub, minus I sub 1, end sub, times R sub 1, end sub, plus I sub 2, end sub, times R sub 2, equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>Ɛ</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>−</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
